document_data.name: Farthington Roenall
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Farthington Roenall''' was a nobleman and the patriarch of the [[Athkatla]]n Roenall family as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was one to look out for his friends and their families and availed himself to those in need.
document_data.Relationships:
Farthington had a son [[Isaea Roenall|Isaea]] who served in the [[Amn]]ian army. He seemed to not be aware of Isaea's illegal business dealings.

Despite their differences, Farthington thought highly of [[Lord de'Arnise]] and made a point to attend his funeral. He was fond of his friend's daughter, [[Nalia de'Arnise|Nalia]].
